participant_1.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

participant_2.background:
I am always learning new things and trying to improve my skills, but I am not always confident in my abilities.
I'm known for my moves on the dance floor.
My worst nightmare came true when I lost my skunk purse in the crowd at a concert.
i live in a bad neighborhood.
I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find.

content.text: Good! I'm excited to be learning new things about myself and my skills.
That's great! I'm always learning new things too. I just moved to a new city and I'm excited to explore it.
That sounds fun! I'm not very adventurous, so I'm not sure I'd ever move to a new city.
It can be scary, but it's also really exciting! I'm enjoying the change of pace.
I'm glad you're enjoying it! I'm sure you'll make some great memories in your new city.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to dance! I'm always trying new moves and I'm always up for a good dance party.
That sounds like fun! I'm not much of a dancer, but I can appreciate a good dance party.
Well, we'll have to have a dance party sometime!
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
I am! I'll bring the music and you bring the moves.
Sounds like a plan! I'm excited to dance with you!
